page.title: 07HOME LIFE OF CHILD,CAUNTON
page.content: {A day in the life of Peter aged 9.} Every day I get up at 7am. I go down stairs and go out side . At 8am. I feed my poultry and give them water. Then I have to see that my budgies have some seed and water, then, if I feel like eating, I go back in the house and have my breakfast. After breakfast I clean my teeth and get ready for school.Before I go to school I sometimes have to let Fred, my pony, out of his stable into the field. After school I return home to do all my jobs again and collect my eggs.Then I shut all the hens up for the night.Sometimes I watch TV or stay outside,then I go to see nan and grandad who live nearby.Then home to bed at 9.00pm.
